Field.ElementLabel: 23. From the above list, choose the 3 activities you would most like to be able to do without any difficulty (for example, if you would most like to be able to climb stairs, kneel, and hop without any difficulty, you would choose: 1. 12 2. 8 3. 14).

24. From the above list of three activities, choose the primary activity you would most like to be able to do
without any difficulty (for example, if you would most like to be able to climb stairs without any difficulty, you would choose: Primary goal.13)
